title: Research Paper on Cognitive Bias
description: Write a 1500-word research paper analyzing three different cognitive biases and their impact on decision-making.

title: Midterm Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering chapters 1-6, including derivatives and limits.

title: Essay on WWI Causes
description: Analyze the primary causes of World War I and discuss their interconnected nature.

title: Argumentative Essay Draft
description: Submit first draft of argumentative essay on chosen topic for peer review.

title: Lab Report: Cell Division
description: Complete lab report on mitosis and meiosis observations with microscopy images.

title: Weekly Discussion Post
description: Participate in online discussion about learning theories and respond to two classmates.

title: Problem Set 8
description: Complete integration problems from chapter 8, exercises 1-20.

title: Primary Source Analysis
description: Analyze three primary source documents from the American Revolution period.

title: Grammar Quiz
description: Online quiz covering advanced grammar rules and punctuation.

title: Final Project Proposal
description: Submit proposal for final research project including hypothesis and methodology.
